0.text: Innate: Nautilus'  basic attacks are empowered to deal 14 − 116 (based on level) bonus physical damage and  root the target for 0.75 − 1.5 (based on level) seconds.
0.html: Innate: Nautilus' basic attacks are empowered to deal 14 − 116 (based on level) bonus physical damage and root the target for 0.75 − 1.5 (based on level) seconds.
markedPassages: 14 − 116 (based on level)
root

1.text: This effect cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.
1.html: This effect cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.

0.text: Active: Nautilus hurls his anchor in the target direction that stops on the first enemy or terrain hit.If the anchor hits an enemy, it deals magic damage and  reveals them,  dragging them toward Nautilus while he also  dashes toward them within 0.9 seconds. Afterwards, the target is  rooted for 0.1 seconds.
0.html:
Active: Nautilus hurls his anchor in the target direction that stops on the first enemy or terrain hit.

If the anchor hits an enemy, it deals magic damage and reveals them, dragging them toward Nautilus while he also dashes toward them within 0.9 seconds. Afterwards, the target is rooted for 0.1 seconds.
markedPassages: reveals
dragging
dashes
rooted

1.text: If the anchor hits terrain, Nautilus  dashes to that location and 50% of Dredge Line's  cooldown and  mana cost are refunded.
1.html: If the anchor hits terrain, Nautilus dashes to that location and 50% of Dredge Line's  cooldown and  mana cost are refunded.
markedPassages: dashes
cooldown
mana cost

2.text: Nautilus is  unable to move or attack while Dredge Line is in flight. He can cast  Titan's Wrath and  Riptide during the dash.
2.html: Nautilus is unable to move or attack while Dredge Line is in flight. He can cast Titan's Wrath and Riptide during the dash.
markedPassages: unable
Titan's Wrath
Riptide
possibleConcerningAbilities: Nautilus is  unable to move or attack while Dredge Line is in flight. He can cast  Titan's Wrath and  Riptide during the dash.

0.text: Active: Nautilus grants himself a  shield for 6 seconds, and while it holds, his basic attacks are empowered to apply Pain of Wrath to the target and surrounding enemies.
0.html: Active: Nautilus grants himself a shield for 6 seconds, and while it holds, his basic attacks are empowered to apply Pain of Wrath to the target and surrounding enemies.
markedPassages: shield

1.text: Pain of Wrath: The target takes magic damage over time, half dealt immediately and the other half dealt after 1.25 seconds.
1.html: Pain of Wrath: The target takes magic damage over time, half dealt immediately and the other half dealt after 1.25 seconds.

2.text: Titan's Wrath  resets Nautilus'  basic attack timer.
2.html: Titan's Wrath resets Nautilus' basic attack timer.
markedPassages: resets
possibleConcerningAbilities: Titan's Wrath  resets Nautilus' basic attack timer.

0.text: Active: Nautilus sends three waves of explosions that radiate from him over 0.561 seconds. Each wave deals magic damage to enemies hit, reduced to 50% against those hit by subsequent waves beyond the first, and  slows them by an amount that decays over 1.5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Nautilus sends three waves of explosions that radiate from him over 0.561 seconds. Each wave deals magic damage to enemies hit, reduced to 50% against those hit by subsequent waves beyond the first, and slows them by an amount that decays over 1.5 seconds.
markedPassages: slows

1.html: Riptide deals 150% damage against monsters.
markedPassages: monsters

0.text: Active: Nautilus sends out a  Depth Charge that chases the target enemy  champion, accelerating over time and creating eruptions every 0.264 seconds in its wake that also briefly grant  sight of the area. Enemies hit by the eruptions are dealt magic damage,  knocked up for 1 second, and  stunned for a duration.
0.html: Active: Nautilus sends out a Depth Charge that chases the target enemy champion, accelerating over time and creating eruptions every 0.264 seconds in its wake that also briefly grant sight of the area. Enemies hit by the eruptions are dealt magic damage, knocked up for 1 second, and stunned for a duration.
markedPassages: Depth Charge
champion
sight
knocked up
stunned

1.text: Upon reaching the primary target or when it moves too far away, the Depth Charge erupts a final time. The primary target takes increased damage, is  stunned for the same duration, and  knocked up for a modified duration.
1.html: Upon reaching the primary target or when it moves too far away, the Depth Charge erupts a final time. The primary target takes increased damage, is stunned for the same duration, and knocked up for a modified duration.
markedPassages: stunned
knocked up

textContent.html:
Active: Nautilus hurls his anchor in the target direction that stops on the first enemy or terrain hit.

If the anchor hits an enemy, it deals magic damage and reveals them, dragging them toward Nautilus while he also dashes toward them within 0.9 seconds. Afterwards, the target is rooted for 0.1 seconds.
